title: Unofficial Bevilex
description: The goal of this autoinstaller is to provide a stable, comprehensive graphics overhaul for Oblivion through an automated installation of Bevilexâ€™s excellent graphics guide. The results bring Oblivion close to modern visuals - complete with HD textures, revamped UIs, ENB, shader packages and much more.
author: Sam

title: Lexy's LOTD Unofficial
description: Lexy's Legacy of the Dragonborn is a massive overhaul of Skyrim with Legacy of the Dragonborn being the core mod that it is built around. Lexy's LOTD was created by DarkLadyLexy and her guide is located here: https://wiki.nexusmods.com/index.php/User:Darkladylexy/Lexys_LOTD_SE
author: Mdc211

title: Ultimate VR Hybrid
description: Now Featuring Legacy of the Dragonborn v5, The Ultimate VR Hybrid List is an all-in-one heavily modded VR Modlist designed for mid-to-high end VR capable PCs while being highly compatible with all current generation VR HMDs. It's the Frankenstein lovechild of The Lightweight Lazy List, SIRVAGG, The AerowynX Graphics and Sound Guide, with flavors of Lexy's LOTD, and some special sauce by yours truly.
author: Timboman

title: FO4 Enhanced Edition
description: A hardcore list made to both expand and deepen the Commonwealth, built around the Horizon Gameplay Overhaul. Every encounter is deadly, and ammo is scarce, can you survive the Wasteland?
author: AUGSpeed

title: Ultimate Skyrim
description: Ultimate Skyrim is a total conversion modlist for The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, built around the Requiem Roleplaying Overhaul, and created by Belmont_Boy. It transforms Skyrim into an immersive and unforgiving landscape, where only the strong and the clever survive.
author: LadyZeefa

title: Banana Split
description: An expanded yet casual Fallout 4 experience featuring additional quests and expansions, a multitude of new weapons and armor, and a variety of challenges for you to overcome.
author: Lively

title: Vanilla Sprinkles
description: A basic mod list to give you a head start modding Fallout 4, with HQ textures and some quality of life improvements.
author: LaughingHyena

title: Total Skyrim Overhaul
description: TSO is a modlist based on Requiem 1.9.4 and AZ Tweaks with a significant number of custom edits, additional items, and enhanced graphics. It's hard so get prepared to die, a lot. Now with Legacy of the Dragonborn v5! Version 2.5.6
author: Total

title: Sim Settlements Experience
description: This is a Modlist designed to showcase the wide variety of add-on packs available for Sim Settlements playthroughs.
author: SirLach and the Sim Settlements Community

title: Nice Overall Improvement SE
description: NOISE is a Modlist designed to be built upon by users, with enhanced graphics, mechanics, and immersion, while staying true to the original vision of Skyrim mechanics; basically, Skyrim++ This Modlist has high compatibility with modded player homes, quests, etc. that allows for you to add what mods you would like (within reason), as long as you take the time to understand how modding works.
author: DoubleDog(Shelb) maintained by Helidoc65

title: Keizaal
description: Keizaal is a small Vanilla+ modlist that is meant to enhance and expand on the base game without compromising Bethesdaâ€™s original vision. It also aims to maintain a level of consistency and integration between the Beyond Skyrim projects in order to make Tamriel feel like one cohesive whole.
author: Pierre Despereaux
